pkgmetadata.longdescription: AutoItLibrary is a Robot Framework keyword library wrapper for for thefreeware AutoIt tool (http://www.autoitscript.com/autoit3/index.shtml)using AutoIt's AutoItX.dll COM object. The AutoItLibrary classprovides a proxy for the AutoIt keywords callable on the AutoIt COMobject and provides additional high-level keywords implemented asmethods in this class.
